CustomField.defaultValue: /* Default GM contacts to rank 1, Dev contacts to blank. */ IF(CONTAINS($RecordType.DeveloperName, "GM"), 1, null)
CustomField.description: Used to sort contacts within an account, for example, to pick the primary one
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to sort contacts within an account, for example, to pick the primary one
CustomField.label: Rank
